home.title: Hello,World!
home.introduction: This is an introduction in English.

index.about_me_1: I am a professional licensed kimono stylist and photographer based in Tokyo, Asakusa.
index.about_me_2: I started my adventure with photography in 2016. I worked with KIRIN Australia on their First Press Photography campaign and with GirlGaze as a BTS photographer, among others. I specialize in street and portrait photography
index.about_me_3: I developed an interest in kimono and in 2017 I started attending Aoyama Kimono Gakuin. In 2019 I acquired a professional kimono consultant and stylist licence. In February 2021 I graduted with an advanced professional qualification.
index.about_me_4: I want to offer you an authentic experience ‚Äî I use only traditional vintage items and choose a kimono outfit for you based on your personal style and any requests you may have. I tell you about the meaning of each little item, add historical and cultural background, all while I dress you. I provide high quality portrait photos, which become tangible memories of your personalized kimono experience.
index.about_me_5: My photography and work have been featured in magazines, newspapers, YouTube videos, radio and TV.
index.about_me_6: I run my own kimono studio in Asakusa, where all the styling and preparations for the shoot take place.
index.studio_me_1: I run my own kimono studio in Asakusa, where all the styling and preparations for shoots take place. I have a large collection of kimono, obi, various accessories. On the day of the shoot I will wait for you at my studio. It takes about 15 minutes on foot from Asakusa Station. Address:
index.about_kimono_n_photo_1: I offer personalized kimono dressing with a thorough explanation about each item and a street / shrine / garden / park location photoshoot. I have indoor locations available to book -- a traditional Japanese inn and an authentic snack bar in Asakusa.
index.about_kimono_n_photo_2: I use only antique silk kimono and obi. Formal, casual modern style.
index.inquiry_body_1: I can also offer kimono dressing (kitsuke) service, before a party or an event.
index.inquiry_body_2: I can do yukata, casual kimono, formal kimono, hakama, furisode, kurotomesode, men‚Äôs kimono and hakama, bridal kimono. Hairstyling available.Please inquire!

service.number_photos: ~professionally edited photos with printing rights(digital files only)
service.about_1: Inspired by the rich world of kimono patterns, fascinating history, colours and tradition, I decided to share my skills and knowledge with others. In 2018 I created INKIMONO ‚Äî a professional portrait photoshoot service that also combines my kimono knowledge.
service.about_2: While we discuss the outfit for your photoshoots I often add some historical and cultural background of kimono! I believe that knowing what you wear, where it came from, what‚Äôs the story behind it, makes you appreciate it more and get even closer to Japanese culture.
service.plan_top_5: ‚Äî before the shoot I will prepare a full kimono outfit for you
service.plan_top_6: (for friends, partners etc) based on your personal style, things and colors you like, and any requests you may have.
service.plan_top_7: Please note that unedited data is not provided under any circumstances -- only edited photos.
service.plan_top_8: If you'd like to bring your own kimono for the photoshoot -- rates will remain the same.
